text: A painter will paint n walls with the same size and shape. The fee is calculated by nKlh. If more expensive paint is used, which factor changes?
If 3r = 18, what is the value of 6r + 3?
Which of the following is equivalent to a^frac(2/3) for all values of a?
If frac(5/x) = frac(15/x+20), what is the value of frac(x/5)?
A line passes through origin with slope frac(1/7). Which point lies on it?
If a = 5 root(2) and 2a = root(2x), what is x?
If frac(x-1/3) = k and k = 3, what is x?
If x > 3, which of the following is equivalent to frac(1 / frac(1/x+2) + frac(1/x+3))?
If 3x - y = 12, what is the value of frac(8^x / 2^y)?
If t > 0 and t^2 - 4 = 0, what is the value of t?
If x + y = 10 and x - y = 4, what is the value of x?
